variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a missense mutation, altering the protein sequence.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_001256459.3:c.137C>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 85% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 70% on day 7.
